content: WASHINGTON  June 1 A Delaware court ruled on Thursday that Cypress Semiconductor must delay its annual shareholder meeting  ruling in favor of ex-CEO T.J. Rodgers who has waged a board battle against the company he founded.

title: Cypress Semiconductor forced to delay annual meeting by Delaware court

content: Sept 28 Chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp  said it had withdrawn an offer for chipmaker Atmel Corp  after the offer expired.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress Semiconductor drops bid for chipmaker Atmel

content: Sept 28 Cypress Semiconductor Corp has withdrawn its offer for Atmel Corp  the second failed attempt by the company to acquire a chipmaker this year.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Cypress Semiconductor drops bid for chipmaker Atmel

content: Cypress Semiconductor Corp  is working on an offer to acquire Atmel Corp   the U.S. chipmaker that agreed to sell itself earlier this month to Dialog Semiconductor Plc   according to people familiar with the matter.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Exclusive: Cypress to challenge Dialog with bid for Atmel - sources

content: The bidding war for Integrated Silicon Solution Inc intensified with rival chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp further sweetening its offer to $22.60 per share.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon bidding war hots up with Cypress's fresh offer

content: June 25 The bidding war for Integrated Silicon Solution Inc intensified with rival chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp further sweetening its offer to $22.60 per share.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Integrated Silicon bidding war hots up with Cypress's fresh offer

content: June 25 Cypress Semiconductor Corp  further sweetened its offer to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc to $22.60 per share.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress raises bid for Integrated Silicon to $22.60/shr

content: June 23 Chinese consortium Uphill Investment Co raised its offer to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  to $23 per share  trumping Chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp's latest bid of $22.25.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Uphill raises bid for Integrated Silicon

content: June 22 Cypress Semiconductor Corp raised its offer to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc to $22.25 per share  its latest salvo in a prolonged bidding war for the chipmaker with Chinese consortium Uphill Investment Co.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress raises bid for Integrated Silicon again

content: June 18 Chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp  raised its offer to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  to about $21.25 per share  trumping Uphill Investment Co's latest bid of $21.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress Semiconductor raises bid for Integrated Silicon

content: Chipmaker Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  said on Thursday it had struck a deal - for the third time - to be bought by China's Uphill Investment Co  just a day after it said it had agreed to be bought by Cypress Semiconductor Corp .
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon agrees to be bought by Uphill - for third time

content: June 11 Chipmaker Integrated Silicon Solution Inc said on Thursday it had struck a deal - for the third time - to be bought by China's Uphill Investment Co  just a day after it said it had agreed to be bought by Cypress Semiconductor Corp.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Integrated Silicon agrees to be bought by Uphill - for third time

content: June 11 Chipmaker Integrated Silicon Solution Inc said on Thursday it agreed to merge with Uphill Investment Co in a deal valued at about $667 million  a day after it agreed to be bought by Cypress Semiconductor Corp .
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon agrees to be bought by Uphill Investment

content: Chipmakers Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  and Cypress Semiconductor Corp  have failed to reach a merger agreement due to potential antitrust concerns.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon  Cypress Semi deal falls apart

content: June 10 Chipmaker Integrated Silicon Solutions Inc  which rejected a bid from Cypress Semiconductor Corp two days ago  reversed its decision on Wednesday and said it had now agreed to Cypress's terms for the $643 million deal to proceed.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Integrated Silicon agrees to be bought by Cypress Semi

content: June 8 Chipmakers Integrated Silicon Solution Inc and Cypress Semiconductor Corp have failed to reach a merger agreement due to potential antitrust concerns.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Integrated Silicon  Cypress Semi deal falls apart

content: June 10 Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  said it agreed to be acquired by Cypress Semiconductor Corp  on Wednesday  days after rejecting the fellow chipmaker's offer citing antitrust concerns.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon agrees to merger with Cypress Semi

content: June 8 Chipmakers Integrated Silicon Solution Inc and Cypress Semiconductor Corp failed to reach a merger agreement due to potential antitrust concerns.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: ISSI  Cypress Semiconductor fail to reach merger agreement

content: May 29 Cypress Semiconductor Corp raised its offer to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc to $20.25 per share  beating Uphill Investment Co's increased offer made earlier on Friday.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress ups ISSI buyout offer to $20.25 per share  beats Uphill deal

content: Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  said on Friday it expected to hold talks with Cypress Semiconductor Corp  regarding a buyout offer from its fellow chipmaker.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon says expects to hold talks with Cypress Semiconductor

content: May 13 Chip maker Cypress Semiconductor Corp  said it offered to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  for $19.75 per share  trumping an offer by a Chinese consortium of investors led by Summitview Capital.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Cypress Semiconductor offers to buy Integrated Silicon Solution

content: May 15 Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  said on Friday it expected to hold talks with Cypress Semiconductor Corp regarding a buyout offer from its fellow chipmaker.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: Integrated Silicon says expects to hold talks with Cypress Semi

content: May 13 Chipmaker Cypress Semiconductor Corp  said it offered to buy Integrated Silicon Solution Inc  for $19.75 per share in cash  trumping an offer by a Chinese consortium led by Summitview Capital.
name: Cypress Semiconductor Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Cypress Semiconductor offers to buy Integrated Silicon Solution
